text: "I Hate This Part" is a song recorded by American girl group The Pussycat Dolls. The sont was released on October 14, 2008, through Interscope Records. It was taken from their second studio album, Doll Domination. It is an electropop song about a breakup. It was written by Wayne Hector, Cutfather, and Lucas Secon, while Cutfather, Jonas Jeberg, and Ron Fair produced the song. == Charts == Chart performance for "I Hate This Part" Chart (2008â€“09) Peak US Hot Dance Club Songs (Billboard) 1 US Mainstream Top 40 (Billboard) 11 == References == Category:2008 songs Category:The Pussycat Dolls songs
title: I Hate This Part
